description:
Questions about the baseball coach causes a dispute in  the school`s meeting.
For the school, teachers want good behaved students who don`t disobey the school policy.  
Miss Hiraizumi was very supportive to the students at first until she finds out the truth about the money and is furiously angry at Kurokan.
Meanwhile, the principle of Washinomori High hears about the rumors of Kurokan. How will the school handle this?
Source: crunchyroll
